name: Crypterium
public_notice: Contract address changed from 0x80a7e048f37a50500351c204cb407766fa3bae7f to 0x08389495d7456e1951ddf7c3a1314a4bfb646d8b. Refer to https://news.crypterium.com/crpt-swap-after-kucoin-hack

description.en: Crypterium is revolutionary digital mobile cryptobank. Crypterium is aiming on provision of comprehensive vertical integrated services, considering collaboration with other cryptocurrency solutions and teams of blockchain enthusiasts.
